alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 13 at 2:40PM EST until February 14 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Northern Oneida county. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dress in layers and be prepared for dangerously cold conditions. Wind chills below zero will persist through the day Monday.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
